Grey: Heals you for 1hp/s in social interactions
Green: Heals you for 2hp/s in social interactions
Blue: Heals you for 3hp/s in social interactions
Purple: Heals you for 5hp/s in social interactions
Gold: Heals you for 7hp/s in social interactions

Grey: Reduces intel drain rate using package scan by 20%
Green: Reduces intel drain rate using package scan by 25%
Blue: Reduces intel drain rate using package scan by 30%
Purple: Reduces intel drain rate using package scan by 40%
Gold: Reduces intel drain rate using package scan by 50%
